summary: This is a calendar entry for a tentative event in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled for November 21, 2021. It appears to be a personal event for an attendee, Allison Stoddart, who is associated with the law firm WilmerHale.

keyFacts: A tentative event related to the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (20 Cr. 330) was scheduled for November 21, 2021.
Allison Stoddart of the law firm WilmerHale was listed as the attendee for this event.
The event was categorized as a 'Personal' class event, suggesting it may not be a public hearing.
